name: JobGraphs
tag_list: software, job-trends, software-trends, graphs, competing-technologies, erp, crm, eai, bpm, etl, ecm
overview:
Job Graphs provides graphical analytical interpretation of various job trends in IT/Software industry.

At Job Graphs you can:

* Find out the number of jobs in your technology
* Find out how many openings are there for your technology in different   countries
* Find out country-wise what salaries do they enjoy
* Find out which role has how much demand in your technology
* How much experience has how much demand in your technology
* Find out what skills are in how much demand in your technology
* Go through month wise global analysis of demand for your technology
* Compare your technology with its competition.
* Finally, see where you stand in the map

—- Job Graphs reports on the number of open jobs for competing ERP, EAI, CRM and virtualization applications as well as programming languages and operating systems skills. It also shows where the jobs are located, the experience and additional skills required and the average salaries offered. - MSDynamicsWorld.com

—- Quite an interesting site for software professionals- RogerH, Killerstartups.com
